thread.section_title: Michael's House - UPDATED 2017 Hotel Reviews & Price Comparison (Beijing, China) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Great Find in Beijing
thread.title_full: Great Find in Beijing - Review of Michael's House, Beijing, China - TripAdvisor

author: mlwoolley21
title: Great Find in Beijing
text: A lovely little hotel/bed and breakfast with an excellent staff and all the amenities you might need. Hotel is clean and rooms are modern and well-designed while at the same time having several traditional Chinese elements. Location is about a 10-minute walk from the subway and near to several main roads where taxis can always be found. Highly recommended as a better alternative to the big chain hotels!
